nasahubble1953458012414267668.content: Go, Comet 3I/ATLAS, go!    Hurtling at a whopping 130,000 miles per hour, this comet has the highest velocity ever recorded for a solar system visitor.  Hubble observations allow astronomers to more accurately estimate the comet's size:
nasahubble1953458012414267668.author: nasahubble
